entities.description: The unweighted number of occurrences for each category in the dataset.
The average value calculated from the valid cases in the dataset.
The median value calculated from the valid cases in the dataset.
The mode value or most frequently occurring value from the valid cases in the dataset.
The minimum value recorded in the dataset.
The maximum value recorded in the dataset.
The standard deviation value calculated from the valid cases in the dataset.
Arrest transaction number used to identify specific arrest incidents.
The number of missing data points in the dataset.
The number of valid cases used for calculations in the dataset.

relationships.description: Indicates the unweighted number of occurrences for each category in the dataset.
Provides the average value calculated from the valid cases.
Provides the median value calculated from the valid cases.
Provides the mode value calculated from the valid cases.
Provides the minimum value recorded in the dataset.
Provides the maximum value recorded in the dataset.
Provides the standard deviation value calculated from the valid cases.
Indicates the arrest transaction number used to identify specific arrest incidents.
Provides the number of missing data points in the dataset.
Provides the number of valid cases used for calculations in the dataset.
